name: WorldOS
description:
Play the game between 12:00PM and 12:59PM to progress through the story.

(Hint hint: Play the Android version and find the hidden easter egg about time limit!)

There are 2 outcomes to this game, 1 good ... 1 bad.

Make the right choice. Play 2 times. Simulate my operating system:

WORLD OS - the world's first universal operating system

A realm of endless possibilities.
